newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Two Colombian brokerages suspended from trading.
newsitem.headline: Two Colombian brokerages suspended from trading.

text.p: Two Colombian brokerages have been suspended for possible illegal trading practices, according to a statement from the Bogota Stock Exchange.

It identified the firms as Gabriel Ferrero & Cia S.A. and Acciones y Valores S.A. and said their suspension had been ordered by stock regulators as part of a bid to "preserve market stability and integrity."
Brokers at both firms are suspected of involvement in unauthorized and irregular trading in government securities, the statement said. -- Bogota newsroom, 571 610 7944
